verbs.description: [ARG0: ex - broward] judge [V: rocking] [ARG1: son] enters hall of fame during his years on the bench broward circuit judge john frusciante won the respect of his colleagues for an even - handed temperament his namesake son chose a career a little less decorous but no john frusciante jr
